Engineclub API¶

This API is under rapid development at the moment, and is not stable.

Retrieve an item by id¶

field name type
   

url: /api/item/[item id]/ example: /api/item/4b91379689cb160dda000000/ method: GET access: public

Retrieve items by location and/or categories¶

field name type
   

Submit an item¶

field name type
   

Update an item¶

field name type
   

Submit a moderation¶

field name type
   

Submit an alert for an item¶

THIS NEEDS ALIGNED WITH MODERATION

include alerts over errors, inappropriate content could be done as an update, with attributes indicating a problem, but more obvious if an alert, and signifies importance. could be done as an update, but also have as an alert as shortcut

field name type
